metadata.title: CVE-2024-30187 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Anope before 2.0.15 does not prevent resetting the password of a suspendedaccount.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-30187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

anope - 2.0.12-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: anope package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.12-1ubuntu1').
